import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var gameSlices=createSlice({name:"game",initialState:{isEasyMode:JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("isEasyMode"))||false,attempts:3,currentLevel:null},reducers:{//облегченный режим
setEasyMode:function setEasyMode(state){state.isEasyMode=!state.isEasyMode;},//уменьшение оставшихся попыток
updateAttempts:function updateAttempts(state){state.attempts=state.attempts-1;},//установка первоначального кол-ва попыток
removeAttempts:function removeAttempts(state){state.attempts=3;},//выбранный уровень игры
setCurrentLevel:function setCurrentLevel(state,action){state.currentLevel=action.payload;}}});var _gameSlices$actions=gameSlices.actions,setEasyMode=_gameSlices$actions.setEasyMode,updateAttempts=_gameSlices$actions.updateAttempts,removeAttempts=_gameSlices$actions.removeAttempts,setCurrentLevel=_gameSlices$actions.setCurrentLevel;export{setEasyMode,updateAttempts,removeAttempts,setCurrentLevel};export var gameReducer=gameSlices.reducer;
